error.invalidPerPage: The 'perPage' parameter must be between 1 and {maxPerPage}.
error.cursorTooLong: The cursor length must not exceed {maxCursorLength} characters.
error.invalidCursorFormat: The provided cursor is not in a valid format.
error.invalidPage: The 'page' parameter must be a positive integer and maximum {maxPage}.
error.filterInvalidValueEnum: '{property}' value provided is invalid. Allowed values are: {allowedValues}.
error.orderByNotAllowed: The 'orderBy' field '{field}' is not allowed. Allowed fields are: {allowedFields}.
error.pageExceedsMaximum: The 'page' parameter exceeds the maximum allowed value of {maxPage}. Received: {receivedPage}.
error.pageCannotBeLessThanOne: The 'page' parameter cannot be less than {minPage}. Received: {receivedPage}.
error.perPageExceedsMaximum: The 'perPage' parameter exceeds the maximum allowed value of {maxPerPage}. Received: {receivedPerPage}.
error.perPageCannotBeLessThanOne: The 'perPage' parameter cannot be less than {minPerPage}. Received: {receivedPerPage}.
error.invalidCursorData: The provided cursor data is invalid.
